description: An existing Cinder volume resource in Openstack. The volume must also be in the same region as the node. Cinder volumes support ownership management and SELinux relabeling.

fsType.description: Filesystem type to mount. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system.

readOnly.description: Force the volume to be mounted in read-only model.

secretRef.description: Reference to a Secret object containing parameters used to connect to OpenStack. Both `namespace` and `name` must be specified in the object.
